Uses of Class
NationMania.core.Fact

  • Packages that use Fact 
    Package Description
    NationMania.core
    NationMania.core is incharge of gameplay and back-end of UI.
    NationMania.ui
    NationMania.ui is incharge of drawing User Interface and Handling user input.

      nextFact the next fact that will be displayed to the player if he hit the "what the fact" button
      Methods in NationMania.core that return Fact 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Fact SortedFacts.getFact()
      Called on the start of evert round, and every time the user asks for a new fact.
      General Process:
      1.
      static Fact Game.getNextFact() 
      private Fact SortedFacts.randomizeFact()
      Randomizing fact in two levels - randomize bin from the buckets, randomize fact inside the bin
      In case we are in the last bin and it's empty, we move the current bin pointer to points to the easy facts index.
      The easy facts index is the nubmer of bin, from which all the facts inside it and inside the easier bins are consider
      easy facts.
      Methods in NationMania.core with parameters of type Fact 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SortedFacts.addFact(Fact fact)
      Get facts from DB, add them to list, sort, and create their type in the types map
      private void SortedFacts.deleteFact(Fact fact)
      Called on 2 situations:
      1.
      private void SortedFacts.markUsed(Fact fact)
      Called from "getFact" function.
      Deletes fact from the bin, and update it in all the history data structures:
      1.
      private void SortedFacts.putFactInBin(Fact fact)
      Called every time new fact is added.
      Calculates the bin this facts belongs to, according to it's weight and the maximum weight.
      Adds fact to relevant bin and promotes total size
      static void Game.setNextFact(Fact nextFact)
      Sets the parameter nextFact as this game's next fact
